room_title: Escape room "The Pharaoh's Tomb" by EXcape Columbus in Columbus
review: The puzzles were okay, but were labeled in such a way that it took from the overall immersion of the room. Definitely good if you want to introduce someone to escape rooms, but not great for an experienced escapist.

room_title: Escape room "The Pharaoh's Tomb" by EXcape Columbus in Columbus
review: I played the Egyptian room with eight friends last night, and we all had a fantastic time! Will definitely be going back.

room_title: Escape room "The Pharaoh's Tomb" by EXcape Columbus in Columbus
review: We had a blast at eXcape! We did the Egyptian room and thought it was very well done. Got out alive with 13 minutes on the clock - not too bad!

room_title: Escape room "The Pharaoh's Tomb" by EXcape Columbus in Columbus
review: Great place to hang with friends and family. You have an hour to escape through theme rooms. We just completed the Egypt room and it was fun and so many puzzles and clues!
